welcome_message_body: Welcome to Houston, where southern hospitality meets big city charm! Get ready to explore our vibrant cultural scene, delicious food, and warm Texas hospitality. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sugar Land Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Houston Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at West Houston Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ellington Field Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal

terminals.description: The private terminal at Ellington Field Airport caters to private and executive flights.
